description: Explore how blockchain technology can evolve to be more environmentally friendly by adopting sustainable practices like transitioning from Proof of Work to Proof of Stake, improving energy efficiency, and employing Layer 2 solutions. Learn about policy measures, industry challenges, and future pathways that harmonize technology with ecological responsibility.
keywords: sustainable blockchain, technology, ecology, Proof of Work, Proof of Stake, Ethereum 2.0, energy efficiency, renewable energy, Lightning Network, carbon credits, policy measures, eco-friendly, blockchain innovation
title: Sustainable Blockchain Practices: Harmonizing Technology and Ecology
